segments.text: How do you think about our boss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's the nicest boss I've had .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think he's the most relaxing person in management .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's more , he said I was the hardest working person in the office !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good . Maybe you'll get promoted .
segments.speaker: S1
